items.description: A shiny iron spear, sharp and ready for use.

locations.description: A beach with pink petals and leaves all over it.

items.name: Passion Fruit
items.description: A juicy ripe passion fruit, it's mouth-wateringly delicious.

items.name: Bottle
items.description: An empty bottle, it could be useful.

npcs.name: Barry
npcs.description: An old sage that seems to know everything.
npcs.dialogue: You better search for some stairs if you head into the forest, young fella...

locations.name: Pink Tree
locations.description: A massive pink tree that towers over the island.

items.name: Pink Key
items.description: A beautiful shiny pink key, it looks important.

items.name: Pink Leaf
items.description: A big pink leaf, a perfect souvenir.

npcs.name: Bananas
npcs.description: A pink dancing monkey, full of energy and mischief.
npcs.dialogue: What's that shiny thing in the pink tree?

items.name: Golden Key
items.description: A beautiful shiny golden key, it looks important.

items.name: Treasure
items.description: You just found... a new friend

locations.name: Abandoned House
locations.description: An old looking abandoned house with shattered windows and a shed

items.name: Ladder
items.description: A huge wooden stepladder, it's sturdy and reliable.

locations.name: White Beach
locations.description: A dreamy paradise... with a scary side

items.name: Shell
items.description: A glistening white shell, perfect for a souvenir.

items.name: Sword
items.description: A sharp viking longsword... how did it end up here?

locations.name: Cobblestone Beach
locations.description: A rare cobblestone beach full of round pebbles

items.name: Hatchet
items.description: A rusty but big hatchet... but sharp enough to cut wood.

items.name: Obsidian
items.description: A stone blacker than a moonless night.

npcs.name: Seagull
npcs.description: An old seagull that lives nearby.
npcs.dialogue: You've come for the key hidden in the shed haven't you... you'll need some light to see inside there..

items.name: Coconut
items.description: A coconut nut (is a giant nut), it's hard but nutritious.

items.name: Coconut Wood
items.description: Versitile and perfect to make a torch.

locations.name: Dark house
locations.description: A house so deep in the forest where light doesn't reach.

items.description: A beautiful shiny black key, it looks important.

items.name: Fireplace
items.description: If you wish to search this place you must turn the light on.

21-24.name: Eel
21-24.description: A gigantic electric eel hungry for you
